episodes.title: 13. "Best Friends" With The Youth Pastor (Cassandra's Story)
episodes.description: In this episode, I sit down with Cassandra, a survivor whose story shines a heartbreaking light on the intersections of spiritual abuse, grooming, and prophetic manipulation. At just 14 years old, Cassandra was groomed and sexually abused by her youth pastor. He was 28. Instead of protection or justice, she was blamed by those who should have protected her. Years later, she was targeted again- this time by a worship leader at EHOP, a cult-like spinoff of IHOP. He stalked her on MySpace before drawing her into a cohesive dynamic built on power and control. After abusing at least 15 women in the church, the organization finally shut down…but not before the victims were forced to take the blame publicly. It wasn’t until she began learning about trauma, nervous system healing, and how to name abuse that she was finally able to break free. She began untangling truth from manipulation, and she’s been healing. This episode is for anyone who’s ever questioned their intuition because of leadership. For anyone who’s questioned their reality, their worth, or whether they were somehow to blame. You’re not alone. — Cassandra’s TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@cassandralau.co Cassandra’s Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cassandralau.co/ Cassandra’s Website: https://cassandralau.co/ Jubilee’s TikTok: ⁠https://www.tiktok.com/@jubileedawns⁠ Jubilee’s IG: ⁠⁠⁠⁠ https://www.instagram.com/jubileedawns⁠ Healed-ish TikTok: ⁠⁠⁠⁠https://www.tiktok.com/@healedishpodcast⁠ Healed-ish IG: ⁠⁠⁠⁠ https://www.instagram.com/healedishpodcast⁠ Apply To Share Your Story: https://forms.gle/S3wYnxTUBRHVE6bH7
subjects: International House of Prayer Kansas City

episodes.title: 11. Raised by a False Prophet (Jedidiah's Story)
episodes.description: In this special two-part interview, I sit down with Jedidiah Hartley, a former insider in the charismatic prophetic movement and the son of Bob Hartley, a once-renowned “prophet” within IHOP, Bethel, and broader New Apostolic Reformation (NAR) circles. Jedidiah grew up watching his father gain global acclaim for prophetic insights , but behind the stage lights was a man faking words, using conference registration lists to look people up, and abusing his power to manipulate, control, and harm. Jedidiah opens up about the painful tension of loving someone who has caused harm, someone he still hoped would turn things around, while also feeling a deep responsibility to protect others by telling the truth. This is a powerful look at what happens when charisma is platformed over character, and why Jedidiah is now speaking out against spiritual manipulation within the NAR. We also talk about how his story helped me process my own (including a false prophecy I received from his father). — Follow for more: Jedidiah’s IG: https://www.instagram.com/jedidiahhartley/ Jubilee’s TikTok: ⁠ @jubileedawns⁠ Jubilee’s IG: ⁠ @jubileedawns⁠ Healed-ish TikTok: ⁠ @healedishpodcast⁠ Healed-ish IG: ⁠ @healedishpodcast⁠ Apply To Share Your Story: ⁠ Submit Here⁠
subjects: International House of Prayer Kansas City

episodes.title: 8. Courtship Rules And Koolaid Lies (Alisha's Story)
episodes.description: Part 2 of 2 Scroll for CW In this episode, Alisha shares her chilling experience inside a high-control cult church where the pastor dictated every part of her life—including who she could date, how much she could talk to them, and even how she entered the elite crowd of the youth group. From hazing rituals to strict courting rules, Alisha’s story reveals the hidden trauma that often hides behind “godly” obedience. Now, she’s reclaiming her voice through her platform Spilling the Koolaid and breaking the silence on the emotional abuse she endured for years. — Please note: This episode includes mentions of religious abuse. Take care as you listen. — Follow for more: Alisha's Tiktok: ⁠https://www.tiktok.com/@spillingthekoolaid⁠ Jubilee’s TikTok: ⁠⁠ https://www.tiktok.com/@jubileedawns⁠⁠ Jubilee’s IG: ⁠ ⁠https://www.instagram.com/jubileedawns/⁠⁠ Healed-ish TikTok: ⁠⁠ https://www.tiktok.com/@healedishpodcast⁠⁠ Healed-ish IG: ⁠ ⁠https://www.instagram.com/healedishpodcast/⁠⁠ Apply To Share Your Story: ⁠https://forms.gle/Q3sXAofmAqAk5bPB9⁠

episodes.title: 4. What I Didn’t Know — And What I Know Now (Jubilee’s Story)
episodes.description: Part 4 of 4 *Scroll for CW* This is where the fog started to lift. After leaving my marriage, I began rebuilding my life and sharing my story online. Just this year, I learned that I never truly knew Ted. In this episode, I talk about what the church hid from me, what I learned from the woman who dated him after me, and how those truths reshaped my understanding of both Ted and the system that protected him. This episode is about clarity, reclamation, and the beginning of real healing. - Please note: This episode includes mentions of domestic violence, sexual trauma and religious abuse. Take care as you listen. - Follow for more: Jubilee’s TikTok: ⁠https://www.tiktok.com/@jubileedawns⁠ Jubilee’s IG: ⁠https://www.instagram.com/jubileedawns/⁠ Healed-ish TikTok: ⁠https://www.tiktok.com/@healedishpodcast⁠ Healed-ish IG: ⁠https://www.instagram.com/healedishpodcast/⁠ Apply To Share Your Story: ⁠https://forms.gle/ZaYgTh1f5KeQqaxK9⁠ - Domestic Violence Hotline: 800-799-7233

episodes.title: 3. A Disney World Burger Saved My Life (Jubilee’s Story)
episodes.description: Part 3 of 4 *Scroll for CW* On the outside, I had a happy marriage. I smiled in photos. I made jokes online. But behind the scenes, I was walking on eggshells. In this episode, I talk about what life inside our marriage really looked like — the manipulation, the gaslighting, and the fear I felt every day. This is also the episode where I tell the full story behind the Disney World burger incident. Spoiler alert: it was the best burger of my life… and it changed the entire course of my life. - Please note: This episode includes mentions of domestic violence, suicidal thoughts, and religious abuse. Take care as you listen. - Follow for more: Jubilee’s TikTok: ⁠https://www.tiktok.com/@jubileedawns⁠ Jubilee’s IG: ⁠https://www.instagram.com/jubileedawns/⁠ Healed-ish TikTok: ⁠https://www.tiktok.com/@healedishpodcast⁠ Healed-ish IG: ⁠https://www.instagram.com/healedishpodcast/⁠ Apply To Share Your Story: ⁠https://forms.gle/ZaYgTh1f5KeQqaxK9⁠ - Domestic Violence Hotline: 800-799-7233

episodes.title: 2. I Thought It Was God — It Wasn’t (Jubilee’s Story)
episodes.description: Part 2 of 4 *Scroll for CW* After graduating from Bethel’s School of Supernatural Ministry, I moved across the country for an internship and met the man I would marry… because a prophetic word told me to. In this episode, I share how I fell for Ted, how the church reinforced the relationship, and how spiritual manipulation disguised as "destiny" led me into a marriage built on emotional and spiritual abuse. - Please note: This episode includes mentions of domestic violence and religious abuse. Take care as you listen. - Follow for more: Jubilee’s TikTok: ⁠https://www.tiktok.com/@jubileedawns⁠ Jubilee’s IG: ⁠https://www.instagram.com/jubileedawns/⁠ Healed-ish TikTok: ⁠https://www.tiktok.com/@healedishpodcast⁠ Healed-ish IG: ⁠https://www.instagram.com/healedishpodcast/⁠ Apply To Share Your Story: ⁠https://forms.gle/ZaYgTh1f5KeQqaxK9⁠ - Domestic Violence Hotline: 800-799-7233

episodes.title: 1. Signs, Wonders, and the Red Flags I Missed (Jubilee's Story)
episodes.description: Part 1 of 4 *Scroll for CW* In the first episode of this four-part series, I’m sharing how I got pulled into a high-control religious environment that promised supernatural power, purpose, and healing. Despite what it offered, the church left me confused, silenced, and slowly unraveling. From speaking in tongues to witnessing “miracles,” I thought I was part of something divine, but I was being groomed to abandon my own discernment. This is where the unraveling began. - Please note: This episode includes mentions of suicidal thoughts, disordered eating, religious abuse, and sexual trauma. Take care as you listen. - Follow for more: Jubilee’s TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@jubileedawns Jubilee’s IG: https://www.instagram.com/jubileedawns/ Healed-ish TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@healedishpodcast Healed-ish IG: https://www.instagram.com/healedishpodcast/ Apply To Share Your Story: https://forms.gle/ZaYgTh1f5KeQqaxK9 - Domestic Violence Hotline: 800-799-7233
